title: Summon Vermin
data:
{{version028}}
{{Flavour|Summons multiple spiders, rats, and worms.}}

'''Summon Vermin''' is a monster-only spell which summons 2-3 of the following creatures into existence<ref>{{source ref|0.28.0|mon-cast.cc|4234}}</ref>:

*{{monsterlink|Hell rat}} (40%)
*{{monsterlink|Redback}} (25%)
*{{monsterlink|Demonic crawler}} (15%)
*{{monsterlink|Tarantella}} (10%)
*{{monsterlink|Jumping spider}} (10%)

{{monsters with spell}}

==History==
*Prior to [[0.14]], the spell was able to generate [[rock worm]]s.
*Summon Vermin was added in [[0.13]]. 

==References==
<references/>
